items.sentence: Tom is still living in the same neighborhood where he was born.
Tom knew that if he needed anything, Mary would buy it for him.
Didn\'t you know there was a Chinese restaurant on Park Street?
One thing I don\'t ever want to do again is punch a time clock.
Only immediate family members attended Tom and Mary\'s wedding.
Tom and Mary kept their relationship hidden from their parents.
I wish I could stay and discuss this more, but I\'ve got to go.
I wish you\'d told that the meeting was going to start at 2:30.
Going to Boston is one of the things Tom wants to do next year.
The bread I bought at the supermarket doesn\'t taste very good.
